title: Minecraft Java版 19w42a 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2019-10-17 18:31 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft Java版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。在快照中打开存档前请务必进行备份。适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.15 仍未发布，19w42a 为其第 10 个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



MINECRAFT SNAPSHOT 19W42A
Minecraft 快照 19w42a
A Minecraft Java Snapshot
一个 Minecraft Java版快照
By popular demand, this snapshot makes Honey Blocks and Slime Blocks no longer stick together. Show us your coolest contraptions!
应广大玩家需求，该快照使得蜂蜜块和粘液块不再黏在一起了。向我们展示你们酷炫的红石装置吧！

CHANGES IN 19W42A
改动

Honey Blocks and Slime Blocks no longer stick together蜂蜜块和粘液块不再黏到一起Dispensers now eject empty bottles properly when not facing water发射器现在如果不面向水，将会正确地不对空水瓶做出反应了Bugfixes漏洞修复


FIXED BUGS IN 19W42A
修复漏洞

MC-82943 - Witch held item uses player held item positionMC-82943 - 女巫拿物品的位置用的是玩家拿物品的位置，导致物品悬浮在女巫面前MC-111444 - Elytras can't open if the server is lagging or when moving upwardsMC-111444 - 在服务器卡了或者玩家正在向上运动（被粘液块弹起等）时不能张开鞘翅MC-114106 - Dispenser plays failed sound when equipping a single pumpkin or skullMC-114106 - 发射器装备单个南瓜或头颅时会播放失败音效MC-127573 - Hover text is displayed for multiplayer chat while in bed even if chat is hiddenMC-127573 - 即使隐藏了聊天栏，在躺在床上时把鼠标悬浮到字上仍然会显示悬浮文字MC-131061 - Armor stands cannot be placed by dispensersMC-131061 - 不能用发射器放置盔甲架MC-132445 - Spawn eggs used on water do not display a hand animationMC-132445 - 在水上使用刷怪蛋不会显示手部动画MC-134495 - Click and hover events still work when F1 is toggledMC-134495 - 就算用 F1 关闭了 UI 界面点击与悬浮事件仍然有用MC-158585 - Villagers spawned from dispensers have default textures no matter what biome they are inMC-158585 - 发射器生成的村民不论处于何生物群系都会是默认的材质MC-159347 - 'Bee nest' is not capitalized correctlyMC-159347 - 蜂巢（Bee Nest）的大小写不对（写为了 Bee nest）MC-159947 - Fire charge from dispenser does not light campfireMC-159947 - 发射器射出的火球不会点燃营火MC-160477 - Dispenser with empty bottles plays successful sound when attempting to remove honey from non-full bee house/empty spaceMC-160477 - 装有空瓶的发射器在尝试从没有装满的蜂房/蜂箱中取出蜂蜜时也会播放成功的音效MC-160524 - Wet sponges placed in the nether make no soundMC-160524 - 在下界放置湿海绵没有音效MC-160894 - Shovel swings when right-clicking on any blockMC-160894 - 用锹右键任何方块都会有摇摆动画MC-160895 - Breeding animals does not display a hand animationMC-160895 - 喂食动物不会播放手部动画MC-160896 - Shearing sheep and mooshrooms does not display a hand animationMC-160896 - 剪羊毛或哞菇不会播放手部动画MC-160897 - Dropping an item using the drop key displays the hand animation but dropping items from within the inventory does notMC-160897 - 使用丢出键丢出物品时会显示手部动画，但是在物品栏内直接丢出物品时不会MC-160901 - Using an item while looking at an entity is no longer possibleMC-160901 - 不再能在指向一个实体的时候使用物品MC-160993 - Empty flower pots cause arm animation to play even when holding incompatible itemsMC-160993 - 拿着不能装进去的物品右键空花盆也会播放手部动画MC-161151 - Right clicking on redstone ore, which causes it to light up, plays no hand animationMC-161151 - 右键点亮红石矿时不会播放手部动画MC-161154 - When the ender eye is unavailable, the hand animation is still playingMC-161154 - 玩家在没有要塞的世界或维度中使用末影之眼时仍然会显示手部动画MC-161220 - Right-clicking on a button while it's pressed inwards still plays a hand animationMC-161220 - 右键已经按下的按钮仍然有手部动画MC-161424 - Chest hatch floats when the chest is open; affects all types of chestsMC-161424 - 箱子锁会在打开的时候悬浮在空中；所有种类的箱子都如此MC-161832 - Transparent and translucent blocks in the inventory render their bottom faceMC-161832 - 物品栏中的透明方块与半透明方块会渲染底面MC-161854 - Animation of teleporting through a nether portal and nausea effect are brokenMC-161854 - 穿过下界传送门以及反胃状态效果的动画坏了MC-161872 - Trident item is very small and renders as a 3D model when dropped or in an item frameMC-161872 - 三叉戟物品被丢出或放置在物品展示框中时渲染的是 3D 模型，并且非常小MC-161876 - Armor models aren't enchanted insideMC-161876 - 盔甲模型的内部没有附魔光效MC-161886 - Dropped trident items rotate around an external axis / Bed items rotate around a non-centered axisMC-161886 - 被丢出的三叉戟物品会绕着物品外的轴旋转 / 床物品绕着不在中心的一根轴旋转MC-161924 - Default texture minecraft:entity/conduit/open_eye causing mipmap to drop from 4 to 3MC-161924 - 自带材质 minecraft:entity/conduit/open_eye 使得 mipmap 等级从 4 下降到 3MC-161939 - Leads are always rendered brightMC-161939 - 拴绳一直都被渲染为亮的MC-161982 - Glowing effect outline no longer applies to banners carried by entities with the glowing effectMC-161982 - 发光状态效果的边框不再显示在有该效果的实体拿着的旗帜上MC-162226 - Large chests are z-fighting with themselves when the two chest blocks have different light levelsMC-162226 - 如果大箱子的两部分光照等级不同，箱子材质将会闪耀MC-162245 - Item frames aren't lit properly (too bright)MC-162245 - 物品展示框亮度不正确（过亮）MC-162261 - Placed rails are not immediately updated when connecting to other railsMC-162261 - 铁轨被放下后并不会立刻更新到与其他铁轨连接的状态MC-162374 - Trident position is not adjusted properly if the player is sneakingMC-162374 - 玩家潜行时三叉戟的位置不正确MC-162402 - Some items are not adjusted properly in third-person mode if the player holding them is sneakingMC-162402 - 某些物品在玩家拿着并潜行时在第三人称视角下位置不正确MC-162529 - Water doesn't have any mipmapsMC-162529 - 水不会被 mipmap 效果处理MC-162534 - When crouching, player, skeleton, zombie and other heads will clip through playerMC-162534 - 潜行时玩家的头、骷髅头颅、僵尸头颅等头颅物品会穿过玩家MC-162540 - When a witch drinks a potion, it's far from her bodyMC-162540 - 女巫喝药水时，药水距离它身体很远，漂浮在空中MC-162611 - Breaking animation is rendered upside downMC-162611 - 破坏动画上下颠倒MC-162729 - Held map doesn't respect light levelMC-162729 - 第一人称下拿着的地图不会根据周围亮度等级改变亮度MC-162783 - Banner block outline is whiteMC-162783 - 旗帜方块的边框是白色的MC-163001 - Certain items have a black backgroundMC-163001 - 某些物品背景是黑的MC-163008 - Zombies, husks and giants have black headsMC-163008 - 僵尸、尸壳和巨人头是黑的MC-163009 - Zombie and player head blocks are completely blackMC-163009 - 僵尸头颅和玩家的头全黑MC-163019 - Honey blocks don't prevent slimes and magma cubes from jumpingMC-163019 - 蜂蜜块不能阻止史莱姆和岩浆怪跳跃MC-163022 - Mobs do not avoid walking over honey blocksMC-163022 - 生物不会主动避开蜂蜜块MC-163030 - Advancements menu isn't clipped by bounds properlyMC-163030 - 进度菜单中的内容没有按照边框正确地裁切MC-163045 - Breaking animation is not always displayed correctly, depending on the angle it's viewed fromMC-163045 - 破坏动画有时不正确显示，取决于视角角度MC-163085 - Textures on some horses and donkeys/mules appear black/white on their hair and tailsMC-163085 - 某些马、驴或骡的头发或尾巴上的材质变黑或变白MC-163089 - Saddle texture on horses/donkeys appear black or completely brokenMC-163089 - 马或驴的鞍的材质显示为黑色或完全不正确MC-163110 - Some blocks are lit inconsistently in the inventoryMC-163110 - 背包中部分方块光照方向与其他方块不一致MC-163146 - Entities and items without transparency by default ignore transparency in resource packsMC-163146 - 默认材质中没有透明度的实体或物品会忽略掉资源包中的透明度MC-163159 - Honey block recipe is unlocked when honey block is obtainedMC-163159 - 蜂蜜块的配方在玩家获取到蜂蜜块时才解锁MC-163227 - Persian cats have a black noseMC-163227 - 波兰猫的鼻子是黑的MC-163242 - Item models render shadows incorrectly and based on camera vectorMC-163242 - 物品模型基于玩家的视角方向不正确地渲染阴影MC-163255 - Some mobs can still jump when on a honey blockMC-163255 - 某些生物即使站在蜂蜜块上也能跳起来MC-163314 - Minecarts cause constant noises when in a honey blockMC-163314 - 和矿车贴贴的蜂蜜块很吵MC-163371 - Paintings drop after world reloadMC-163371 - 重新进入世界后过一会儿画会掉落



官方服务端下载地址Minecraft server.jar

正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/其他https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.tar.gz
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注 Minecraft 1.15（这是什么更新）特性列表的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。Java版的启动器下载地址在上文已经提供。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
